Html:
Does anyone have any information on whether Rawr works in Crossover on a mac?  If so, are there any instructions out there on how to set this up?

Thanks!
I've done it in the past, but it was a while ago. You'd be better off using Mono (v2.2, not v2.4; v2.4 is broken).

Latest versions of Darwine seems to be much more stable (and faster) than mono right now.
If you don't want to compile it yourself, check http://www.kronenberg.org/darwine/ for 1.1.19  (use trix to install the polices and .net).
Thanks!  Will give those a shot.
